parameters.name: MaxResult
parameters.description:
The number of entries to return on each page.

Default value: 50. Maximum value: 1000.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description: The token that is used to start the next query.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID. Set the value to cn-shanghai.

parameters.name: TargetId
parameters.description: The ID of the object. This parameter specifies a filter condition for the query.

parameters.name: TargetType
parameters.description:
The type of the object. This parameter specifies a filter condition for the query. Valid values:

*   USER: the current logon account. This value is available if you use the Tag Policy feature in single-account mode.
*   ROOT: the Root folder in a resource directory. This value is available if you use the Tag Policy feature in multi-account mode.
*   FOLDER: a folder other than the Root folder in a resource directory. This value is available if you use the Tag Policy feature in multi-account mode.
*   ACCOUNT: a member in a resource directory. This value is available if you use the Tag Policy feature in multi-account mode.

>  The value of this parameter is not case-sensitive.
